Immich.description:
Immich is a high-performance self-hosted photo and video backup solution with official mobile apps and 3rd-party smart TV apps.

Note: some optional features included in this Rock-on rely on external services that may require additional accounts. These services are transparently listed and configurable during the initial WebUI setup.

Includes multiple custom docker images: Immich server, Immich machine-learning server, Redis and Postgres.

Based on the official Docker Compose configuration file, available for amd64 and arm64 architecture.

/var/lib/postgresql/data.description: Choose a Database Share for Immich.
/var/lib/postgresql/data.label: Database Share [e.g. immich-db]

UPLOAD_LOCATION.description: The location where your uploaded photos/videos are stored. Has to be the same as Library Share. Note: enter the full path to the share.
UPLOAD_LOCATION.label: Upload location [e.g. /mnt2/immich-library]

DB_DATA_LOCATION.description: The location where your database files are stored. Has to be the same as Database Share. Note: enter the full path to the share.
DB_DATA_LOCATION.label: Database location [e.g. /mnt2/immich-db]

/cache.description: Choose a Cache Share for the machine-learning models.
/cache.label: Cache Share [e.g. immich-cache]

UPLOAD_LOCATION.description: The location where your uploaded photos/videos are stored. Has to be the same as Library Share. Note: enter the full path to the share.
UPLOAD_LOCATION.label: Upload location [e.g. /mnt2/immich-library]

DB_DATA_LOCATION.description: The location where your database files are stored. Has to be the same as Database Share. Note: enter the full path to the share.
DB_DATA_LOCATION.label: Database location [e.g. /mnt2/immich-db]

IMMICH_LOG_LEVEL.description: Log level (verbose, debug, log, warn, error).
IMMICH_LOG_LEVEL.label: Log level [e.g. log]

IMMICH_IGNORE_MOUNT_CHECK_ERRORS.description: When Immich starts, it checks if it can read and write to the storage volume mounts. Set to true to disable checks.
IMMICH_IGNORE_MOUNT_CHECK_ERRORS.label: Ignore error checks [e.g. false]

/data.description: Choose a Library Share, where Immich stores uploaded photos/videos.
/data.label: Library Share [e.g. immich-library]
